remarks: The connected component containing ` A ` is a subset of any clopen set containing ` A ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Sep-2015.)
statement:
concomp.2 $e |- S = U. { x e. ~P X | ( A e. x /\ ( J |`t x ) e. Con ) } $.
concompclo $p |- ( ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) /\ T e. ( J i^i ( Clsd ` J ) ) /\ A e. T ) -> S C_ T ) $.
$d A x $.
$d J x $.
$d X x $.
